column9: pointless as object-level measure because: you would measure it never per obejct - you want to measure the average memory per megabyte across your samples and the maximum PEAK occuring across all samples. Pointless in this sense as you dont want to have a lot of measures about single samples where the samples are different anyway. If we can agree on this, then the criterion category wonderfully determines the evaluation scope :)
